cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6087, Improving Access to Workers’ Compensation for Injured Federal Workers Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 206 (Tuesday, November 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COURTNEY:
H.R. 6087.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H6711]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
